name: Levana Stella 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom

reviews.name: Levana Stella 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: I recently Just bought the Levana Stella Digital Baby Video Monitor. When opening the package I was very pleased to see how nicely everything was wrapped and seperated. Packaging was a very neat. The device its self is a little bigger than I had thought tho the camera device is sleek and clean I love the look. My fiance is very pleased with my buy just wish he knew how long to charge battery for over all we will enjoy this video baby monitor to the fullest great product!
reviews.title: Beautiful Design

reviews.name: Levana Stella 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a gift and it was great. The camera pan function is great because you can rotate the camera.
reviews.title: Great products

reviews.name: Levana Stella 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: Bought this monitor awhile ago a LOVE it! Highly reccomend it to all parents!
reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.name: Levana Stella 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: We love all the features that this monitor has to offer, but the only thing that this item lacks is a temperature display. For $260, you would think that this item would come with this feature... Anywhos, other than that, this is most definitely a great product.
reviews.title: Setup way too easy

reviews.name: Levana Stella 4.3" PTZ Digital Baby Video Monitor with Talk to Baby Intercom
reviews.reviewText: I bought this a week ago and was worried it was going to be hard to figure out but setup is easy and use  is fairly straight forward once after quick review. Image quality is pretty good. Gets a little distorted with zoom but the pan right left up down is key! Overall good monitor.
reviews.title: Nice monitor
